description: Process 384-well ELISA data, which can be generated from MolecularDevice, Envision and PHERAstar. Please contact Qianting Zhai, if other formats are needed. Inputfile needs 1) a single csv file generated by the reader, or a zip file compressed with multiple csv files. 2) a barcode table in csv format: the first column is source plate name, and the second column should be corresponding destination plate.
title: ELISA384_multi_reader

properties.name: Run Name
properties.help: This program can be used to process ELISA/illuminance from multiple Readers

properties.name: Input data from reader: data.csv or data.csv.zip
properties.help: The data should be in one csv file

properties.name: Sourcebarcode : Destinationbarcode table.
properties.help: This file can be csv file or 'Windows Formatted Text (.txt)'.

properties.name: Threshold for the positive well, only used for IgG screen.
properties.comment: It is not required or used for 4-antigen run.

properties.name: sample Position
properties.help: choose 1 or 2 or 3 or 4. 1=A1, 2=A2, 3=B1, 4=B2. It is not critical, because a file containing all data will still be generated.

properties.name: background well position
properties.help: choose 1 or 2. 1=A1, 2=A2.  It is not critical, because a file containing all data will still be generated.
